candidates.name: Stuart Challenger
candidates.why_elect: I am a Natural Resource Engineer, which gives me a good understanding of both the hard and soft process involved in development. I have a good understanding of the drivers of the West Coast residents through my work and sporting involvement over the years.
candidates.why_stand: I believe that the West Coast has a great future, however, there are a large number of people looking for short terms gains and not considering the long term. I am standing for consideration of what we want the West Coast to be in 20 years.

candidates.name: Logan John Skinner
candidates.why_elect: I will drive action and accountability at WCRC. I grew up on a farm and am now involved in tourism so understand some of the key industries in Westland first hand. I have worked for the Government Auditor Audit NZ in the past and seen good and bad governance.
candidates.why_stand: We need more action and accountability from WCRC. Too often problems are ignored until they become an expensive "emergency" fix—such as the Hokitika sea wall.
